DOC.brief_summary: In this study we test Diclofenac and Nepafenac and compared patients experience and comfort following administration of these ophthalmic drops.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Diclofenac vs. Nepafenac Ophthalmic Drops: Patient Comfort
DOC.detailed_description: In this study we will compare the ocular tolerability between preservative-free Diclofenac and Nepafenac drops. Using a standard comparative scale we will measured discomfort, itching, burning and pain in intervals of 1 sec, 5 sec, 1 min and 5 min post-administration. The results may aid both doctors and patients in decision regarding the post surgical anti-inflammatory treatment.
DOC.criteria: patient facing cataract surgery under 18 cognitive decline
